testPages
Class Cards

java.lang.Object
  testPages.Cards

public class Cards
extends java.lang.Object

Class semantics and roles:
Cards is to model a deck of cards that is to be distributed out to players. An equal number of cards will be held as the 'hidden cards'. Cards will also know who owns which cards after the cards have been dealt.

Information maintenance:
Creation: GameLogic is created at start up
Deletion: GameLogic is deleted when the game has finished or otherwise been terminated.

Author:
Matt SeGall (Class Skeletons & Code)

Field Summary
private  java.lang.String[][] Deck
          contains the cards held by which player (the first index number, 7 is held cards)
private  java.util.Random generator
          a random number generator used to randomize the cards for dealing
